CustomField.formula: IF(FS_Outlet_HQ_Chain__r.FS_of_Hide_Water_Changes__c > 0,"Hide", IF(FS_Outlet_HQ_Chain__r.FS_of_Hide_Water_Changes__c > 0,"Show", IF( AND (FS_Outlet_HQ_Chain__r.FS_of_Hide_Water_Changes__c > 0, FS_Outlet_HQ_Chain__r.FS_of_Hide_Water_Changes__c > 0),"Hide and Show are Present","")))
CustomField.label: Current Hide/Show Water Button
